collection:
Privacy Policy

Document Wizard

Privacy Policy

  

This Privacy Policy describes how Document Wizard ("we," "us," or "our")
collects, uses, and discloses information when you ("user" or "you") visit and
use our website, https://document-wizard.com ("Website") and the services
provided through our website.

Information We Collect:

1.1 Personal Information:  
We may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily provide it.

For example we collect your email address when you request us to send you an
email with your document.

1.2 Usage Information:  
We may collect non-personal information about your use of the Website, such as
IP addresses, browser type, operating system, and pages visited.

This
information is collected to improve the functionality and security of the
Website.

Use of Information:

2.1 Providing and Improving Our Services:  
We only use the information collected to deliver our services to you and
discard it later.

We do not
knowingly collect personal information from children.

If we become aware that
we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 16, we
will take appropriate steps to delete it.

Please note that this Privacy Policy applies to the information collected
through our Website and services and does not apply to any third-party
websites or services linked to our Website.

By using our Website and services, you consent to the collection, use, and
disclosure of information as described in this Privacy Policy.
sharing:
Privacy Policy

Document Wizard

Privacy Policy

  

This Privacy Policy describes how Document Wizard ("we," "us," or "our")
collects, uses, and discloses information when you ("user" or "you") visit and
use our website, https://document-wizard.com ("Website") and the services
provided through our website.

2.3 Legal Compliance:  
We will never disclose your information to any third parties, including law
enforcement agencies as we do not store it in our databases.

Third-Party Service Providers:

We may engage third-party service providers to assist us in operating the
Website and providing our services.

These service providers may have access to
your personal information only to the extent necessary to perform their
services and are contractually obligated to maintain the confidentiality and
security of your information.

By using our Website and services, you consent to the collection, use, and
disclosure of information as described in this Privacy Policy.
